translation.en: [Kirigan] On our maps, the Shadow Fold is a black stain. A scar that severs Ravka in two.
translation.ja: 地図に広がる黒い染みは ラヴカを分断する影溜まりだ

translation.en: It was created hundreds of years ago as an act of vengeance by the Black Heretic.
translation.ja: 数百年前の黒の異端者による 復讐(ふくしゅう)の産物

translation.en: A man who could summon shadow.
He was among those rare souls, the Grisha, who could manipulate the elements of this world.
translation.ja: その男は自然界の力を操れる グリーシャだった

translation.en: The Fold locked East Ravka away from the sea ports on the west.
translation.ja: 西側の海港と 切り離された東ラヴカは

translation.en: The east withered and became vulnerable to attack from enemy nations in the north and south.
translation.ja: 衰退して南北の敵国からの 攻撃にさらされた

translation.en: With their powers, only the Grisha were capable of crossing the Fold.
translation.ja: 影溜まりを渡る力を持つ グリーシャは⸺

translation.en: They joined forces with the King in service to Ravka.
translation.ja: 王国軍に入り ラヴカに仕えた

translation.en: They became the lifeline between the two sides of our country.
translation.ja: 彼らは東西を結ぶ生命線だが

translation.en: But they were still hated for the sins of the Black Heretic.
translation.ja: 黒の異端者が犯した罪のため 憎まれていた

translation.en: Sins felt most deeply by his descendants.
translation.ja: 子孫へと深く刻まれ続ける罪

translation.en: Old myths foretell of a Grisha never before seen.
translation.ja: 神話では あるグリーシャが現れ

translation.en: One who could destroy the Fold, reunite Ravka and redeem our people.
translation.ja: 影溜まりを消し ラヴカを救済するという

translation.en: A Summoner of pure light.
And so we wait for the one who will deliver us from the dark place we made in the world.
translation.ja: 我々が生み出した暗闇から 解き放ってくれる救世主

translation.en: We wait
for the Sun Summoner.
[Alina] When I was young, I was afraid of the dark.
translation.ja: 子供の頃 恐れていた暗闇は⸺

translation.en: When I got older, I learned that darkness is a place,
translation.ja: １つの場所なのだと 大人になり学んだ

translation.en: -and it's full of monsters. -[growling]
translation.ja: それは怪物たちの生息地

translation.en: I live in East Ravka, but I've never been welcome here
translation.ja: 私は東ラヴカで 歓迎されたことがない

translation.en: because I look like my mother, and she looked like the enemy.
translation.ja: 母のように 敵に似ているからだ

translation.en: Alina, how can you do that in here?
translation.ja: アリーナ よく描けるな

translation.en: Bumps help with texture.
The Fold looks different on mine. I need to get a better view from your country.
translation.ja: 故郷では 影溜まりは そう見える？

translation.en: [man 1] She grew up here. Come on!
translation.ja: 彼女も この国育ちだ

translation.en: [man 2] The Shu Han didn't want her either.
Cartographers, listen up. We're almost there. Pack up and be ready to leave.
translation.ja: 地図製作者たち 着くから荷物をまとめて

translation.en: And if you lose anything, you will not be getting a replacement.
translation.ja: 紛失物の補充は ないと思って

translation.en: [Alina] But they aren't the monsters. They're just boys.
translation.ja: 怪物は この青年たちではない

translation.en: I learned about my true enemy when I was a child.
translation.ja: 真の敵は 子供の頃に知った

translation.en: [young Alina] Is it real?
Of course it's real.
The Fold ate your parents.
translation.ja: 影溜まりが あなたの両親を食べた

translation.en: It's the reason for many of the orphans here.
translation.ja: 人々の 無謀な横断のせいで

translation.en: People trying to cross. Taunting the Saints.
translation.ja: ここに孤児が大勢いる

translation.en: Then why cross it? Why not go around?
translation.ja: 横断せずに 回り道すれば？

translation.en: Read the map.
The north want our Grisha dead,
the south guards its mountains.
translation.ja: 北にはグリーシャの敵

translation.en: We have nowhere else to go.
Now work on your shading, girl.
Keep a pencil in your hand.
Or else someone will put a rifle in it instead.
translation.ja: さもないと 銃を持たされる

translation.en: [Alina] I spent years thinking I'd find a way out.
translation.ja: ずっと逃げ出したかった

translation.en: Around the Fold, to go somewhere where no one cares where I'm from.
translation.ja: 私の出自を 誰も気にしない場所へ

translation.en: But now, I'm old enough to know the only way out is through.
translation.ja: そのためには 影溜まりを越えるしかない

translation.en: We are never going to see it go away. This abomination is here forever.
translation.ja: あれが消えることは 永遠にないんだな

translation.en: You don't go to church. A Saint who can summon the sun will destroy it.
translation.ja: 太陽の召喚者なら消せるはず

translation.en: I'd like to see even one person who isn't scared of that.
[woman] I bet I know someone.
Mal. He isn't afraid of anything.
[sighs] You'd be surprised.
[softly] Alina.
Mal?
Look what I found.
-Where? -[young Mal] Little guy's lost.
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 迷子さ

translation.en: But I found some chewed plants in the woods to the east. I bet his warren's there.
translation.ja: 東側の森に 巣があるんだと思う

translation.en: Why you run from me, half-breed?
translation.ja: 逃げるな　ハーフめ

translation.en: Stay away from him.
Or what? You going to draw me, rice eater?
translation.ja: 断ったら 俺を描くか？

translation.en: Or I'll cut you.
-[footsteps approaching] -What's this?
Who's tracked in dirt on my rug? Mal Oretsev!
translation.ja: 誰が敷物に泥を？ オレツェフ！

translation.en: Mal?
I know you're hiding here!
-Come out now! -No!
Can't hide forever.
Yes, I can!
All right, maybe you can.
But this is what you become! A boy who hides from a fight!
translation.ja: 戦いに背を向けて逃げる男に なりたいの？

translation.en: Get very good at it, maybe you'll survive to see 20.
translation.ja: その道を究めれば 20歳を迎えられるかも

translation.en: Bring me a big rabbit before the dinner bell goes.
translation.ja: 夕食までに ウサギを連れてきて

translation.en: Final bets! Final bets!
translation.ja: もうすぐ賭けを締め切るぞ

translation.en: Keep it clean, boys, go on.
translation.ja: クリーンに戦ってくれ

translation.en: [man 1] Yes!
[man 2] Get stuck in there. Let's go! Come on!
translation.ja: 気合を入れろ　やれ！

translation.en: It's all right, breathe. Breathe, here we go. Come on.
translation.ja: 呼吸を整えろ さあ 戦うんだ

translation.en: He'll be all right?
I'm sure we'll find out. Come on, hit him! Belt him.
translation.ja: 見てろ ぶっ飛ばしてやれ！

translation.en: [man 3] Hurt him, now! Hurt him!
[man 3] Come on, let's go! Let's go now! Let's have it. Come on!
translation.ja: ほら 向かっていけ

translation.en: Lovely!
Yes! Yes!
You beauty!
My boy, Mal Oretsev, wins again! Who wants a go?
translation.ja: マル･オレツェフの勝ちだ 次の相手は？

translation.en: [man 4] I'll take a turn.
How about it? Just you and me.
translation.ja: どうだ？ この俺と戦ってみないか？

translation.en: No, no, no.
If you lose, you'll be in the medika. If you win, they'll throw you in the brig.
translation.ja: 勝っても負けても 拘束されちまう

translation.en: Shut it down, boys! Shut it down!
translation.ja: 今日は これでお開きだ

translation.en: You try me without that magic, huh?
It's just air.
Come on! Anyone!
Alina!
When did you get in?
Yesterday. Everyone's getting their assignments.
Suppose cartography's heading back south. [chuckling]
I found out 'cause they're putting my unit with yours again. They're looking for a way through the mountains.
translation.ja: お前たちの部隊と 山を抜ける道を探すことに

translation.en: Oh! So we're back together?
They can't keep best friends apart for too long.
translation.ja: 親友は引き離せないのさ

translation.en: Corporal Oretsev, are you saying you miss me?
Well, I need someone to take the fall for my petty crimes, that's all.
translation.ja: 悪さをした時の 身代わりが必要だ

translation.en: -Oh, they moved our tent. -Yeah, it's down that end now.
translation.ja: 私のテントは？ あっちだ

translation.en: [Alina] So many First Army here.
translation.ja: 第１軍が多いね 配給所みたい

translation.en: We look like a halfway house, accepting donations.
translation.ja: 第１軍が多いね 配給所みたい 俺に配給は不要だ 決闘で これを稼いだからな

translation.en: Actually, I won't be accepting any donations -because I won this betting on a fight. -Huh?
translation.ja: 俺に配給は不要だ 決闘で これを稼いだからな

translation.en: Look at you. Flush with five whole… kruge?
translation.ja: ５クルーガー札？ 外国のお金だよ

translation.en: What will you do with foreign money? We're not in Ketterdam.
Don't crush my dreams.
[woman] Again! Inferni!
translation.ja: やれ　火を呼ぶ者(インフェルニ)

translation.en: Nice. Nice. Good. Good. Again.
translation.ja: 悪くないわね それじゃ もう一度

translation.en: [Mal] This is why our tents got moved. -[woman] Good. -Grisha wanted more space.
translation.ja: テントの場所を取られた

translation.en: Ugh. Grisha.
Now. I'm going to do it again.
Show-offs.
[woman] Another Inferni and Squaller.
translation.ja: 次は嵐を呼ぶ者(スクエラー)も

translation.en: They're always picking on us when their general's not around.
translation.ja: 将軍の目を盗み 挑発してくる

translation.en: It's like home all over again.
It wasn't all bad. We learned some good life lessons back then.
translation.ja: 当時 学んだことが 役立ってる

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah? Care to share with the class?
One, don't cry in public.
Hide your emotional breakdown for when you're alone. Obviously.
-Two, always carry a weapon on you. -Always.
translation.ja: その２ “武器は常に携帯” それは当然

translation.en: There's a third I can't remember.
[soldier 1] Open her up, we're loading!
[Alina] That looks new.
Brand-new. Grisha call it ultralight.
translation.ja: そうだ　グリーシャが “超軽量”だと

translation.en: Made by their own Fabrikators. It's supposed to be faster.
translation.ja: 作り出す者(ファブリケーター)が造船した 速いらしい

translation.en: What happened to the last one?
Never came back.
-[man] There he is! -Here we go.
translation.ja: いたぞ 来やがった

translation.en: I would have made a killing on you, but nah, he refused to loan me any money, so…
translation.ja: 君に賭けたかったけど 貸してくれなくて

translation.en: That's because you're a child in a bigger child's body.
translation.ja: ガキに貸すカネはないさ

translation.en: -You're shorter than I am. -Okay. Dubrov, Mikhael, this is Alina.
translation.ja: ダブロフ ミカエル アリーナだ

translation.en: Your little friend from Keramzin? -[Dubrov] Ah… -This is her.
translation.ja: ケラムツィンの頃の “小さな友達”？

translation.en: -"Little friend"? -How is that wrong?
translation.ja: 小さな？ 間違いじゃない

translation.en: -He talks about you all the time. -What does he say?
translation.ja: 話は聞いてる どんな？ ええと…

translation.en: -[Mikhael] Oh, well… -Don't listen to these two. They like to exaggerate. It's what they do.
translation.ja: 耳を貸すな 話を誇張する奴らだ

translation.en: -[chuckles] Look at him! -Oh, he's so easy to rile.
translation.ja: あの顔 見ろ 怒りっぽいな

translation.en: Is that annoying you?
Yeah? All right. Come on, you bastard.
translation.ja: いいぜ　やってやる

translation.en: -Come on, then. -[horn blaring]
-Saved by the horn, Mal. -[Mal] Oh, I wouldn't say so.
translation.ja: 救われたな 続けるか？

translation.en: What does he say about me?
All right, listen up.
I know some of you have been on the road for a week, so I'll be brief.
translation.ja: 長旅の後だから手短に話す

translation.en: Most of you will continue north to the Fjerdan frontlines.
translation.ja: 大半はフョーダの前線に 進んでもらう

translation.en: Or south to the Shu Han border.
translation.ja: 残りはシュー･ハン国境だ

translation.en: The Second Army, however, has a shiny new solution to our food shortage,
translation.ja: 一方 第２軍は 食糧不足を解決するために

translation.en: and it sails tomorrow for Novokribirsk.
translation.ja: ノヴォクリバースクへ

translation.en: If this model works, it means a full meal for everyone in this tent next week.
translation.ja: 成功すれば 来週には 皆に十分な食事が行き渡る

translation.en: It means bullets for your guns and sugar for your tea.
translation.ja: 十分な数の弾丸や 砂糖がそろう

translation.en: [soldier] How about some whiskey?
Yes, that would be nice, but don't hold your breath.
Of course, they need our help bringing those supplies back, so some of you will be assigned.
translation.ja: 物資運搬の応援のために 第２軍にも人員を回す

translation.en: "There's nothing to fear."
"I will now be selecting names for what I call the 'nightmare lottery.'"
translation.ja: “悪夢のくじ引きで 参加者を決める”

translation.en: For the supply run across the Fold!
translation.ja: 応援の人員を発表する

translation.en: Sergeant Yure Teplov.
Tracker Malyen Oretsev!
Did he… But you're in our unit.
It has to be an error. It has to be.
translation.ja: きっと何かの間違いだ

translation.en: -Didn't sound like an error, Mal. -And finally, Medic Nolech Barenovsky.
translation.ja: きっと何かの間違いだ そうは思えない 衛生兵のバレノフスキー

translation.en: That's it. Dinner in one hour.
translation.ja: 以上だ 夕食は１時間後 階級順に並べ

translation.en: Come back and line up by rank. Dismissed.
translation.ja: 夕食は１時間後 階級順に並べ 解散

translation.en: Mal.
Well, if it does work, I'll get to visit Ketterdam.
translation.ja: 成功すればケテルダムへ

translation.en: [woman] Come on, come on!
[gambler] Yes! I love it!
Darling, please. Drinks here. Drinks all round here, please.
translation.ja: こっちに酒を持ってきてくれ

translation.en: Hey, you take Zemeni coin, yes?
[man] Let me see that.
The Lucky Nine casino up the block has had trouble with counterfeit coin lately. Heavy, but brittle.
translation.ja: 最近 出回ってる偽造硬貨は 硬いが もろいらしい

translation.en: Oh, come on, now. I've been here for hours. My money is good, no?
translation.ja: 何時間も前から賭けてる俺を 疑うのかよ

translation.en: Zemeni coin can take a bullet. But the knockoff…
translation.ja: 本物なら銃弾もはじくが…

translation.en: Busted.
What does that prove?
Hey! Wait! What are you doing?
translation.ja: やめろ　俺に触るな

translation.en: Get off me!
No loud noises at the table, Jesper.
translation.ja: 騒がしいぞ　ジェスパー

translation.en: You'll scare off the pigeons.
Wouldn't want that, boss.
-Shouldn't you be on the door? -Yeah, right away, boss.
translation.ja: 持ち場は？ 戻ります

translation.en: Early for action, innit, Kaz?
translation.ja: 今日は早いな　カズ

translation.en: What do you want, Rotty?
Someone stole a DeKappel from a merch's private residence last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜 デカッペルの作品が 盗まれた

translation.en: Is that so?
It's a painting. A landscape of Ravka. The Fold. Oil on parchment.
translation.ja: ラヴカの風景と 影溜まりが描かれた絵だよ

translation.en: I know who DeKappel is.
Well, he don't do nudes, so I never heard of him.
translation.ja: 俺の興味は裸婦像だけで…

translation.en: Get to it, Rotty.
Worth something like 10,000 kruge.
The thief had to get past four roving guards, high fences, padlocked doors,
translation.ja: 警備システムを 突破したらしい

translation.en: and a security system designed by one of them Grisha witches.
translation.ja: グリーシャの魔女のやつさ

translation.en: -Fabrikator. -Whatever.
translation.ja: 作り出す者だ 複数で協力したのでなければ 幽霊の仕業だな

translation.en: The point is, either it was a group effort or a ghost.
translation.ja: 複数で協力したのでなければ 幽霊の仕業だな

translation.en: Why does this concern me?
I've got a buyer lined up. Legit money.
translation.ja: 買い手なら山ほどいる

translation.en: So, uh… if you hear a whisper… [clicks tongue]
translation.ja: 絵について うわさを聞いたら…

translation.en: Who can hear a whisper here?
Hello, Inej.
What information do you have for me tonight?
A lead on a job. A big one. Enough money to change lives.
translation.ja: 大きな仕事です 人生が一変するほどの

translation.en: It doesn't take much to change someone's life in the Barrel.
A million kruge?
What's the name?
Dreesen. A wealthy merchant.
translation.ja: ドレーセン　裕福な商人です

translation.en: Dreesen. I've heard of him. He could afford it.
translation.ja: 名前は知ってる カネもあるだろうが⸺

translation.en: The question is, what's worth a million kruge to him?
translation.ja: 何に そんな大金を？

translation.en: He's looking for a crew willing to cross the Fold into East Ravka and bring back something.
translation.ja: 影溜まりを渡り 東ラヴカに行くのが条件とか

translation.en: The Fold?
Well, of course, certain death pays a million. He didn't say what he wants nicked?
translation.ja: 100万は命の値段か 望みの物は？

translation.en: No. But he's taking meetings tonight, starting at midnight.
translation.ja: 分かりませんが 今夜 会合に出かけてました

translation.en: Tell me you followed him.
He brought someone in from a ship.
Took a way back to his house in the Garden District to avoid attention.
translation.ja: 何者かを 家に連れ帰りました

translation.en: I would have followed him inside, but Dreesen's hired some private security.
translation.ja: 護衛がいたので 家への侵入は断念を

translation.en: I would have had to use my knives to get closer.
-[thunder rumbling] -Private security.
Anyone we know?
A Zemeni man. I think his name is Tendo. You know him?
translation.ja: ゼメニの者です 確か名前はテンドー

translation.en: Yeah. He gambles at one of Pekka's clubs.
translation.ja: ペッカのクラブの常連だ

translation.en: So I won't have leverage on him. But Pekka will.
translation.ja: 奴に抱き込まれるかもしれん

translation.en: Kaz, I got this lead from one of the girls at the Menagerie.
translation.ja: メナジェリーの子から得た 情報です

translation.en: They tell me things in case you'd buy them out, like you did with me.
translation.ja: 私のように買い取れば？

translation.en: I didn't, I'm paying off your indenture.
You know what I mean. This one girl, Kesh, she has skill. She's like me.
translation.ja: ケシュという子は 私に似てて…

translation.en: I only invest in the one of a kind.
She isn't like you.
No one is.
So? What's our move now?
translation.ja: それで どうするんです？

translation.en: You're the one of us who believes in a higher power.
translation.ja: お前は神の力を信じてるな

translation.en: If we're going to survive a round trip through the Fold,
we'll need a miracle or two.
What's a Shu girl doing here?
I'm Ravkan. On the cartography team.
translation.ja: ラヴカ人よ　地図製作者なの

translation.en: She's half Shu. An orphan.
translation.ja: シュー人とのハーフで 孤児だ

translation.en: [line cook] Is that an answer?
Back of the line. Your friends, too.
translation.ja: 並び直せ　仲間もだ

translation.en: I don't know them.
Then you go. Come on!
translation.ja: なら さっさと行け

translation.en: [woman] You can get arrested for that.
Stealing from Second Army will get you thrown in a hole.
translation.ja: 第２軍からの窃盗は重罪よ

translation.en: Maybe you should arrest me.
Hang on.
Aren't you one of our escorts for the crossing?
That's right.
Well,
I don't mind sharing.
Well, it's not for me. It's for a friend.
Some of it's for me.
What's your name?
I'm Mal. I'm a tracker.
Zoya. I'm a Squaller.
translation.ja: ゾーヤ　嵐を呼ぶ者よ

translation.en: When I get nerves the night before, I like to have a good tumble with a stranger.
translation.ja: 私は任務の前夜に 見知らぬ者と寝るのが好き

translation.en: Clears my head. That's my remedy.
translation.ja: 緊張が収まり 頭がクリアになる

translation.en: I should go.
You don't seem like the type who does what they should.
translation.ja: 規則を守るタイプには 見えない

translation.en: [sighs] I found you.
[Alina] You always do, somehow.
Well, it's not hard, you always perch.
[scoffs] I'm brooding.
Well, I have something for you.
translation.ja: いい物を持ってきたぞ

translation.en: Where did you get these?
-I stole them. -From a Grisha tent? [laughs]
translation.ja: 盗んだ グリーシャから？

translation.en: I thought it would get me an invitation to jail,
but it just got me an invitation to tumble with a Grisha.
translation.ja: グリーシャから床に誘われた

translation.en: You tumbled a Grisha?
[chuckles] No. No, I just flirted with her.
translation.ja: いや 口説いただけ

translation.en: Maybe she flirted with me.
-Look, Grisha women scare me. Okay? -[chuckles]
translation.ja: グリーシャの女は苦手だ

translation.en: Did you see the lieutenant?
Yeah.
And?
Well…
turns out they do need me. So…
translation.ja: 俺の力が必要らしいんだ

translation.en: So…
I could shoot you in the foot.
translation.ja: 足を撃ってあげようか？

translation.en: -You're a terrible shot. -[chuckles]
Don't cross it.
When I was young,
translation.ja: 子供の頃 悪夢を見たんだ

translation.en: I had nightmares about it.
Going in.
Finding my parents…
still dead.
Waiting for me.
-Well, orders are orders. -[scoffs]
If it goes wrong, come back. You've lost enough to it already.
translation.ja: 何かあれば逃げて 自分まで死んじゃダメ

translation.en: I'll find my way back to you.
Promise.
But first, I am going gambling in Ketterdam.
translation.ja: ケテルダムで ギャンブルを楽しんだらな

translation.en: [chuckling] Without me?
I'll write you a letter.
[Kaz] Tell us how to safely cross the Fold.
translation.ja: 影溜まりを渡る方法は？

translation.en: The Fold?
If I knew safe passage through that, I'd be wealthier than the whole Merchant Council.
translation.ja: 知ってたら 商人のトップに立ってる

translation.en: You told me you brought in girls from Os Alta. The other side.
translation.ja: オス･アルタの子を 連れて来るのでは？

translation.en: Yeah. The hard way. Lost a few to those damn volcra, too.
translation.ja: 数人はヴォルクラに 食われる前提でね

translation.en: Nah, there's no trick to it except how it makes people disappear from time to time.
translation.ja: 影溜まりを 安全に渡る方法などないね

translation.en: I heard you bragging of a way to make a path.
translation.ja: 道を作れると聞いたが

translation.en: I was taking kruge from a tourist. A little lie.
translation.ja: 旅人相手に 稼ぐためのウソさ

translation.en: The Fold keeps those Ravkan bastards and their Grisha attack dogs in check.
translation.ja: 影溜まりがなきゃ ラヴカ人が⸺

translation.en: Can you imagine how dangerous it would be if it wasn't there?
translation.ja: 攻めてくることになるぜ

translation.en: [man] Just go around.
It stretches all the way north to the Fjerdan border.
Ja. So go to Fjerda. March through the permafrost.
translation.ja: そうさ　永久凍土の上を歩け

translation.en: How long would that take?
From here? Four months.
Maybe five.
We don't have that kind of time.
Either you take your time or you take your chances.
Here's what I don't get.
-We're going to be here all night. -Rude.
translation.ja: その話 長い？ 失礼な

translation.en: Why haven't they tried going under it? Just dig a tunnel.
Tried that. More than a century ago.
Something… heard them digging.
translation.ja: 怪物に音で気づかれた

translation.en: It was made hundreds of years ago by that crazy Grisha…
The Black Heretic.
The one who controls shadow. They've got one in their army now. General Kirigan?
translation.ja: キリガン将軍も その黒の異端者だろ？

translation.en: [Inej] Your point?
[Jesper] If one of his kind made it, can't he unmake it?
translation.ja: 作れるなら消せるだろ

translation.en: Have you ever put out fire by adding more fire?
Then what's the opposite?
-A Sun Summoner. -[Jesper] Right, then, one of those.
translation.ja: 太陽の召喚者 なら そいつを…

translation.en: Doesn't exist.
Doesn't exist yet.
Dreesen comes into town, doesn't waste a minute. Sends out for a crew to steal something but doesn't specify what.
translation.ja: ドレーセンは急いでる 何か事情があるのだろう

translation.en: Is it heavy, large, worth more than a million on the black market? Maybe he doesn't know.
translation.ja: 何を盗むのかも不明だ 彼自身も知らないのかも

translation.en: We can let this one go, Kaz.
-Sounds like a trap, anyway. -[Kaz] A trap would sound easy.
translation.ja: ワナかも そんなに甘くないさ

translation.en: This is something else.
[man] Boss, boss. We intercepted a note from Dreesen.
translation.ja: ボス ドレーセンのメモを 入手しました

translation.en: Did you, now?
It's for the owner of the Orchid. Says they require the services of a Heartrender. Tonight.
translation.ja: 破壊する者(ハートレンダー)の手配を 頼んでいます

translation.en: A Heartrender? Why?
Doesn't say. Just they need it before midnight.
translation.ja: 深夜までに必要だとか

translation.en: You don't bring in a Heartrender unless you need an answer out of someone who isn't willing to talk.
translation.ja: 誰かに 口を割らせるつもりだな

translation.en: That's how we get this job before anyone else. Bring Dreesen a Heartrender.
translation.ja: 俺たちが先に連れていけば 仕事を得られる

translation.en: [man] Boss, just one problem. Pekka Rollins knows.
translation.ja: ペッカ･ロリンズも この件を知ったようです

translation.en: Pekka Rollins.
[chuckles] Pekka Rollins.
So, you know who I am. That makes things easier.
translation.ja: この私を知ってるのか？

translation.en: [man] You lead the Dime Lions.
translation.ja: ダイム･ライオンズの主

translation.en: My men tell me that you run this club.
translation.ja: このクラブのオーナーか？

translation.en: I do. [wheezing]
And the brothel next door.
translation.ja: 売春宿のオーキッドも お前のもの？

translation.en: -The Orchid. -That's right.
translation.ja: 売春宿のオーキッドも お前のもの？ ああ

translation.en: Fine girls there. Boys, too. Whatever you like.
translation.ja: いい女がそろってる 男もいるよ

translation.en: Abram, get in here!
Hmm. Abram wouldn't let us talk, so we did the other thing.
translation.ja: その男なら もう始末した

translation.en: I'll jump straight to it. I'm in a bit of a rush.
translation.ja: 急いでるから本題に入る

translation.en: I'm in need of a Heartrender tonight for a million-kruge job.
translation.ja: 破壊する者が必要なんだが

translation.en: And you got one. At the Orchid.
translation.ja: オーキッドに１人いるよな？

translation.en: [man] You want Milana, then. I can get you a good rate for her by the hour…
translation.ja: 目的はミラナか 料金は安くしとくよ

translation.en: No, no, I'm not renting her. It's for a job.
translation.ja: 借りるつもりはない 仕事に必要なんだ

translation.en: If I bring her back, she'll tell you about the job. Next thing you know, everyone is talking about the job.
translation.ja: 仕事から戻れば 彼女を通して話が広まるだろ

translation.en: [breathing heavily] My indentures are discreet.
[Pekka] Hmm. Because they work for you, right?
So here's the deal.
Work for me, give over this dump and the Orchid, then I'll give you 10% of whatever business comes in.
translation.ja: ここと売春宿の売り上げの １割をお前にやろう

translation.en: [chuckling] That's a shit deal. I already get 100%.
translation.ja: あり得ない ここは元々 俺のものだ

translation.en: [Pekka] Yeah, okay.
The other option is…
I'll carve you up and leave you in a barrel for the rats.
translation.ja: お前を切り刻み ネズミの餌にしてやる

translation.en: So… how about ten?
translation.ja: どちらの選択肢を選ぶ？

translation.en: Cheer up, Dubrov. The Black General's here to save the day.
translation.ja: 喜べ ダブロフ “黒の将軍”がお出ましだ

translation.en: Oh, is he going to tear down the Fold?
No, I was being sarcastic.
He's a Grisha, not a miracle-worker.
translation.ja: 彼は奇跡を 起こすわけじゃない

translation.en: Is it him?
General Kirigan.
The leader of the Second Army here to grace us with his presence?
translation.ja: 第２軍の司令官が 直々に現れるとは

translation.en: He must believe the new skiff will be a shining success.
translation.ja: あの船に自信があるのね

translation.en: [man] Or a spectacular failure.
-Alexei. -[Alexei] What?
translation.ja: アレクセイ 何だよ

translation.en: Sorry, Mal.
Do you think he's coming with us?
If he does, then you know what he believes.
translation.ja: それなら成功の確率は高い

translation.en: Are we children, or are we soldiers? Get to your posts and pack your gear. Skiff launches in 20.
translation.ja: さっさと荷造りをせんか 20分後に出航だ

translation.en: Sergeant, get your crew ready!
Mal, you're with me, son. Chin up.
translation.ja: マルは俺と来い 暗い顔をするな

translation.en: I've crossed it three times without incident. You'll get your first soon enough.
translation.ja: 俺は３度 渡ってる お前も平気さ

translation.en: I'll be back before you know it.
And I'll be here the whole time.
Me and the cartographers, I mean.
[young Alina] We can't hide forever. We can run. Together.
translation.ja: ずっと隠れてはいられない 一緒に逃げよう

translation.en: Petya, how did this happen?
translation.ja: ペトヤ なぜ火事が起きた？

translation.en: We don't know. We were extra careful to secure all the lanterns.
translation.ja: 火の管理は 厳重にしてたのですが

translation.en: -And what was damaged? -Nothing major.
translation.ja: 何が燃えた？ 西側の海岸線と⸺

translation.en: Just some records of the western coast line,
translation.ja: 西側の海岸線と⸺ オス･ケルヴォと 川の記録だけ

translation.en: Os Kervo and the river system that runs through it.
translation.ja: オス･ケルヴォと 川の記録だけ

translation.en: -It's really not… -Critical? Geographical data of the territory on the other side of the damn Fold?
translation.ja: 影溜まりの対岸の地形を 記録した地図が⸺

translation.en: Those records?
Yes, but I'm sure that the First Army on the other side has an--
translation.ja: 対岸の第１軍が同じ物を…

translation.en: You think I trust anyone else's intel?
Now someone will have to cross the Fold, to redraw these maps.
translation.ja: 新たに地図を描く必要がある

translation.en: I'll go. Put me on the skiff, I'll go.
translation.ja: 私がやります 船に乗せてください

translation.en: Yes. You will.
translation.ja: では 行ってもらおう

translation.en: Your whole unit will.
I don't understand. We were going south, now we're going west?
translation.ja: 南に行くはずだろ なぜ西に？

translation.en: -What did you do? -Nothing.
Leave her alone, Raisa. You want everything to be her fault.
I'm usually right.
-[Alina gasps] -What the hell are you doing here?
-We've been assigned with you. -No. Turn around right now.
translation.ja: 配備された 今すぐ帰れ

translation.en: Orders are orders.
I could shoot you in the foot.
I like my feet, thank you.
-Tell them you're too sick to go. -I'm never that sick.
translation.ja: 病気だと言え 私は健康よ

translation.en: Lie if you have to.
And what's your lie? I'm with you.
translation.ja: あなたが下りるなら そうする

translation.en: Get off this boat now, or I'll carry you off.
[Sergeant Yure] Raise the gate!
Ready to lock up.
I'll make it, promise.
Sergeant! What now?
The Grisha will tell us.
Not her. The Inferni.
translation.ja: 違う　火を呼ぶ者に

translation.en: [claps hands] Here's how it goes. We go into the Fold,
it gets dark, but we like it dark. That keeps us from drawing attention.
translation.ja: 暗くなるけど 身を隠せるから好都合ね

translation.en: That's how we travel. The only light we use is the blue one at the mast.
translation.ja: この船で使うのは マストの青色の照明だけ

translation.en: It's weak but safe.
[Raisa] But you're an Inferni, right? Why are you here if we're supposed to keep things dark?
translation.ja: 火を操る あなたの役目は？

translation.en: For when the dark comes to keep you.
translation.ja: あなたたちを守ること

translation.en: Where's your general? Kirigan?
[sailor] Ready for launch!
That's our cue.
Right, listen to me, cartographers.
translation.ja: よく聞け 地図製作者たち

translation.en: Until we reach the western dry docks, you are to remain at your station.
translation.ja: 西側のドックに着くまで 持ち場を離れるな

translation.en: Do not, I repeat, do not leave the skiff during the crossing.
translation.ja: 航海中は決して この船から 下りるんじゃないぞ

translation.en: In we go.
translation.ja: さあ 影に入るわよ

translation.en: Marker one.
How many more are there?
Thirty-seven.
No.
-Blow it out! What are you doing? -[creature growling]
What do we--
Come at me! Come at me, you coward!
translation.ja: こっちだ　この臆病者め！

translation.en: [Alina] Alexei, no!
[mouthing] Mal!
Mal!
I'll meet you at the meadow.
General Zlatan. Your orders?
translation.ja: ズラタン将軍 ご命令を

translation.en: It's been too long.
They should have emerged two hours ago.
[soldier] Sir! Look!
Where is the rest of your crew?
So… new management, gents.
Here's the deal.
The Heartrender is gone, boss. Someone else got her.
translation.ja: 破壊する者が 連れ去られました

translation.en: Who?
I really appreciate new business,
translation.ja: 仕事はうれしいですが

translation.en: but you've only paid for an hour of my time, and I have to be back at the Orchid.
translation.ja: １時間後には オーキッドに戻ります

translation.en: [Kaz] The Orchid isn't safe tonight. Your life's in danger with this job.
translation.ja: やめておけ 君に危険が迫ってる

translation.en: Make yourself scarce for a few days afterwards.
Mr. Brekker, are you threatening me? Really? Even if I'm nice, my boss will call the stadwatch on you.
translation.ja: 私を脅すのですか？ ボスが警察に通報しますよ

translation.en: It's not me you're in danger with. It's Pekka Rollins.
translation.ja: 君を狙うのは ペッカ･ロリンズだ

translation.en: My boss would call the stadwatch on him as well.
Which is why your boss is already dead.
translation.ja: ボスは もう死んでるさ

translation.en: -[man] Who are you lot? -We're here to see Dreesen.
translation.ja: 誰だ？ ドレーセンを

translation.en: [man] You're not with Pekka's crew.
translation.ja: ペッカの手下ではないな

translation.en: And you're not in Pekka's pocket anymore if you don't owe him.
translation.ja: 奴への借金は これで返せ

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that coin?
translation.ja: あの硬貨は どこで？

translation.en: [man] Hey! One of these has a hole in it!
Saints.
-Inside. Inside. -[laughing]
One look and I can tell. Criminals.
translation.ja: 一目で分かる 犯罪者どもだな

translation.en: I'm not meeting anyone 'til midnight.
translation.ja: 深夜までは誰とも会わん

translation.en: We heard you needed a Heartrender.
All right, she stays, the rest of you, out.
She stays. And we have an exclusive on this job.
translation.ja: 我々に仕事を任せると 先に確約してもらう

translation.en: Mr. Brekker.
No businessman worth his salt hires his first applicant.
translation.ja: 有能な商人は 最初の志願者を雇わん

translation.en: [Kaz] No. No, I understand.
Of course, I will have to report you to the guild
translation.ja: 俺には商人ギルドへの 報告義務もある

translation.en: for kidnapping and harboring a prisoner without chain of title.
translation.ja: 無許可で 誘拐と軟禁をしたとね

translation.en: You wouldn't.
No businessman worth his salt bargains for what he can take.
translation.ja: 有能な商人は 利益を逃しはしない

translation.en: I have to be back in an hour.
All right, come on.
Who's this?
So you don't know everything after all.
This…
is Alexei Stepanov.
translation.ja: アレクセイ･ステパーノフ

translation.en: Two weeks ago, young Alexei here crossed through the Fold on foot.
translation.ja: ２週間前 彼は歩いて 影溜まりを渡った

translation.en: Alone.
How?
They're keeping it quiet, but allegedly
translation.ja: それは明かされていないが 彼は ある出来事を⸺

translation.en: -he was one of a few witnesses to… -[water pouring]
translation.ja: それは明かされていないが 彼は ある出来事を⸺ 目撃したらしい

translation.en: …an event.
[Alexei] Water.
What kind of event?
[Dreesen] I know an expedition was swarmed by volcra.
translation.ja: 軍の船が ヴォルクラに襲われた

translation.en: Should've been a total loss, but something happened.
translation.ja: 普通なら全滅だが そうはならなかったのだ

translation.en: Some device detonated.
translation.ja: 何らかの装置が起動し

translation.en: Obliterated the volcra, lit up the dark like a forest fire.
translation.ja: ヴォルクラは一掃され 闇に光が広がった

translation.en: I know it wasn't a fire or else no one would have survived.
translation.ja: 東ラヴカ クリバースク 東ラヴカ クリバースク 船は無事だから火事ではない 船は無事だから火事ではない

translation.en: [Dreesen] This was some invention no one had seen before.
translation.ja: 未知の発明による 出来事だと思われる

translation.en: [Zoya] Healer!
He knows.
But he doesn't seem to be able to articulate his account of events.
translation.ja: だが今は話せなくなっている

translation.en: Some form of traumatic lapse.
translation.ja: 恐らく心的外傷による影響だ

translation.en: So…
[Milana] You're safe now.
Now you can just speak
and I will just listen.
All right.
Tell me what happened in the Fold.
translation.ja: 影溜まりで一体 何が？

translation.en: What saved you?
[Alexei] You won't believe me, but…
it was a Sun Summoner.
Who was it?
If I tell you, you'll set me free?
You have my word. I'll set you free.
translation.ja: 約束する　話せば自由だ

translation.en: You're in Ketterdam now, Alexei.
You can go anywhere in the world from here.
Just imagine.
Come on.
Her name is…
Alina Starkov.
[Dreesen] Alina Starkov?
translation.ja: アリーナ･スターコフか

translation.en: Good boy.
Show me the manifest.
Perfect.
You'll set me free now?
Thank you. Of course.
We are now the only people west of the Fold with this information.
translation.ja: 今の話を聞いたのは我々だけ

translation.en: My ship sails for West Ravka at dawn.
translation.ja: 夜明けに西ラヴカへ出航だ

translation.en: If you can prove that you have a way through the Fold and back,
translation.ja: 影溜まりを往復できると 証明できれば

translation.en: I'll put you on that ship with an advance.
translation.ja: 前金を払い 船に乗せる

translation.en: If you don't, I'm giving this job to Pekka Rollins.
translation.ja: 証明できなければ ペッカに任せる

translation.en: Give me a day. I'll have a plan.
You have until sunrise, then your ship will have sailed, Mr. Brekker.
translation.ja: いや 夜明けの出航を 変えるつもりはない

translation.en: The prize is one million kruge.
translation.ja: 100万クルーガー 欲しければ⸺

translation.en: Now bring me Alina Starkov.
translation.ja: アリーナ･スターコフを 連れてこい
